text: Paksantare yadi abiskara kara haya ye tadera du’jana'i papera yogyata labha kareche tabe tadera sthale damraka apara du'ijana tadera madhye theke yadera dabi ultano hayeche prathama du'ijanera dbara, takhana tara allah‌ra name kasama khaka -- ''amadera du’janera saksya ai du'ijanera saksyera ca'ite adhikatara satya, ara amara sima langhana kari ni, kenana tabe nihsandeha amara an'yayakaridera antarbhukta habo.’’
